attributes.action: I think the mosque should be biult there is no reason for it not to be biult because it doesnt cause any obstruction for anyone in the community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. If you wish to write to the Prime Minister instead, you can find contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
